name: Ducky Gauntlet
description:
Ducky seeks glory and the only way to do it is to brave what the Ducks call "Cat Alley," an alleyway where the stray cats are as numerous as they are hungry. Can Ducky make it to the end of the alley, gathering as much treasure as he can? With his trusty feather shot, perhaps he can. 

A new take on the classic arcade game, Gauntlet!

Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse to aim

LMB to shoot

Made by Team Quack for a group college assignment! Check out the games the other members made!

Devin Fitzgerald: https://defiantz.itch.io/

Heather Miller: https://itch.io/profile/serendipitea

Samwise Majchrzak: https://wafflenut.itch.io/
